name: part_011
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】ねねが主役！！！！！ #桃鈴ねね誕生日2022【 桃鈴ねね ⧸ ホロライブ 】 [czfjbNitJ4M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene and her guests (Omaru Polka, Shiranui Flare, Shirogane Noel, and Yukihana Lamy) discuss her birthday merchandise, including a signed postcard and boxer pants.
Nene and the guests huddle together to take a series of close-up commemorative photos.
Nene thanks the viewers and her guests as the stream comes to a close with everyone saying their goodbyes.
The stream ends with an illustration and text promoting Nene's upcoming 2nd Birthday 3D Live.

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: そしてフルセットご購入してくれた方には、ねねの描き下ろし直筆サイン入りポストカード！
subtitles.english: And for those who purchase the full set, you'll get a postcard with Nene's newly drawn illustration and handwritten signature!

subtitles.original: おおー！すごーい！
subtitles.english: Ooh! Amazing!

subtitles.original: 今回はね、しかもね、あの特典のボイスがつくんですけど...
subtitles.english: This time, there's even a bonus voice included...

subtitles.original: 普段ねねのASMRの枠ってちょっとおふざけしちゃうんだけど、ガチマジASMR、録り下ろして来ました！
subtitles.english: Usually, Nene's ASMR streams are a bit silly, but I've recorded some serious, real ASMR for this!

subtitles.original: おー！すごーい！ガチだ！
subtitles.english: Ooh! Amazing! It's the real deal!

subtitles.original: そして直筆のサイン入りポストカードではですね、前回、去年の時もお誕生日の時にやったんだけど、サインとちょっとメッセージみたいな感じで書いていけたらいいなと思ってますので、皆さんよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: And for the handwritten signed postcard, like I did for my birthday last year, I'm thinking of writing a signature and a little message, so please look forward to it, everyone!

subtitles.original: お願いします！おー！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it! Ooh!

subtitles.original: みんな、どう？ねねの今回のグッズ。
subtitles.english: What do you all think of Nene's merchandise this time?

subtitles.original: すごーい！いい感じ！
subtitles.english: Amazing! It's great!

subtitles.original: じゃあパンツ履くでしょ？
subtitles.english: So, you'll wear the pants, right?

subtitles.original: サインしてくれる？じゃあ、パンツに。
subtitles.english: Will you sign them then? The pants.

subtitles.original: いいよ、お尻の...あ、ここにする？ここ。
subtitles.english: Sure, on the butt... oh, should I do it here? Here.

subtitles.original: ちょっと前はな...
subtitles.english: A bit in the front is...

subtitles.original: 何それ？すごーい！
subtitles.english: What's that? Amazing!

subtitles.original: ラミィも履くでしょ？
subtitles.english: Lamy will wear them too, right?

subtitles.original: え、ねぽらぼで履くでしょ？
subtitles.english: Eh, NePoLaBo will wear them, right?

subtitles.original: あ、そう、ねぽらぼで履く。ねぽらぼでお揃いにするので、皆様もお揃いにしてください！
subtitles.english: Ah, right, NePoLaBo will wear them. We'll be matching in NePoLaBo, so everyone else, please match with us too!

subtitles.original: お揃いにしてください！
subtitles.english: Please match with us!

subtitles.original: パッカーン！
subtitles.english: Pakkan!

subtitles.original: 開かないでしょ！
subtitles.english: It won't open!

subtitles.original: 開かない。あ、開かない？
subtitles.english: It won't open. Oh, it won't open?

subtitles.original: ポルカもそれ真似るよ。
subtitles.english: Polka will imitate that too.

subtitles.original: 開かない。開かないから。
subtitles.english: It won't open. Because it won't open.

subtitles.original: というわけでね、最後にね、上着着たし、みんなで可愛い写真撮って終わりにしたいと思います！
subtitles.english: So, finally, since I put on my jacket, I want to end by taking a cute picture with everyone!

subtitles.original: わーい！いいね！
subtitles.english: Yay! That's good!

subtitles.original: みんな準備いいですか？あ、みんな来て来て、固まって固まって。
subtitles.english: Is everyone ready? Ah, everyone come here, huddle up, huddle up.

subtitles.original: あ、アップ、アップで可愛く撮ってください！アップ、アップ！
subtitles.english: Ah, up close, take a cute photo up close! Up close, up close!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: みんな、ありがとう！というわけで、今日のねねの配信はここまで！
subtitles.english: Thank you, everyone! So, that's it for Nene's stream today!

subtitles.original: 皆さん、たくさん見てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone for watching so much!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 四人とも、ありがとう！あ、四人じゃない、三人もありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you to all four of us! Ah, not four, thank you to the three of you too!

subtitles.original: おめでとうー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！おめでとう！またね！おつねねー！ハッピーバースデー！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye! Congratulations! See you! Otsu-Nene! Happy Birthday!
